Credential.summary: The Credential interface of the Credential Management API provides information about an entity (usually a user) normally as a prerequisite to a trust decision.

remarks.para: Credential objects may be of the following types:

CredentialType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface returns a string containing the credential's type. Valid values are password, federated, public-key, identity and otp.
CredentialType.value: A string contains a credential's given name.

CredentialIsConditionalMediationAvailabl.summary: NOTE Experimental The isConditionalMediationAvailable() static method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} which resolves to false.

remarks.para: Subclasses of override this method if they support conditional mediation. See , for example.

CredentialId.summary: The id read-only property of the interface returns a string containing the credential's identifier. This might be a GUID, username, or email address, or some other value, depending on the type of credential.
CredentialId.value: A string containing the credential's identifier.
